channel.title: Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server
channel.description:
Hello
I've been trying to get this to work for a few days but i haven't been able to succeed. At the moment i'm really stuck on this, and i'm about to delete everything. I have done everything that i could think of. I run it from a[b] linux VPs (centOS)[/b] and its a PI source.
[code][root@core-server RSPS]# sh run.sh [b]Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server[/b][/code]
This is my run.sh ( i have no idea if it has something to do with this, but i'better post to much information than less ;D) [code]java -Xmx512m Server[/code]
Friendly greetings
Darry !

item.title: Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

This Means It Needs To Be Compiled So Then The Engine Can Read The Class Files Because It Cant Read Java Files Because It Doesnt Understand Our Language They Can Only Understand Computer Language Which Is Class.

Read full topic
item.source: Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server
